title: Welcome to Ethereal Plane
text: Hello and thank you so much for using OBS Utils!
This right here is the notification panel.
You will only see this if there is any news that are worth sharing.
If you have any Questions, do not hesitate to contact me. Either open an Issue on Github or join the Foundry Discord and ping me there @faey.
Finally, this module supports a local mode of operation, but it works best for Patreon Supporters. You can find all the info you need and my Patreon below.

title: What's new?
text: This release adds this Notification Panel and improves upon MidiQOL Support
Previously, Send-to-Chat did not work for non-GM rolls while using MidiQOL. This has now been fixed.
